original_text: And Moses and Aaron and the chief of the congregation numbered the sons of the Kohathites after their families, and after the house of their fathers,
korean_text: 모세와 아론과 회중의 지도자들이 고핫 자손들을 그 종족과 조상의 가문에 따라 계수하니

sentences.original_text: And Moses and Aaron and the chief of the congregation
numbered the sons of the Kohathites
and after the house of their fathers
